front.title: Authentication, Authorization, and Accounting Requirements for Roaming Nodes using DHCP

abstract.t: The AAA working group is currently defining the requirements for Authentication, Authorization, and Accounting (AAA). This draft lists the AAA requirements to aid roaming nodes using a dynamic address configuration protocol such as DHCP. The node may or may not be using Mobile IP [3] (with co-located care-of-address) or other dynamic address binding protocol.
